label: Voucher
comment: A printed piece of paper or an electronic document that can be used instead of money to pay for an experience, such as a tour, a trip or a meal in a restaurant.

datatypeProperties.comment: The indication of whether or not this cash used for payment. is applicable.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
An issue date, time, date time or other date time value for this declared error.
A name, expressed as text, of the company issuing this experience item voucher.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: A monetary value shown on the face of this experience item voucher.

referencedBy.comment: An experience item voucher identified for this trade settlement payment means.
